attributes.action: More education and harsher punishment for a racist act or offence
attributes.additional_details: Because we have seen and heard of things that    should of got more punishment
attributes.background: We want to tell schools to be harsher on racist acts

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

Information about current requirements for schools is provided here:
https://researchbriefings.files.parliament.uk/documents/CDP-2023-0049/CDP-2023-0049.pdf.

If you would like changes to this, you could submit a petition about that.
